players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am really sorry to hear Bob was killed last night. We need to be very careful today and try to find who among us is the mafia. Let's share any suspicions or observations we have."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. We must work together to identify the mafia in our midst. I'm particularly concerned about Diana's silence last night during the discussion round."

Charlie: "I'd like to remind everyone that we are all in this together and it's important for us to communicate openly. Based on the events of last night, I believe it's crucial that Diana shares any information she may have regarding Bob's death or her..."

Diana: "I'd like to clarify my silence during the previous discussion. Last night, I heard strange noises coming from Bob's house and decided to investigate. Unfortunately, I found him dead. As a mafia member, it is part of our duty to..."
You: "I don't think Diana's story adds up. Why would a villager hear strange noises and investigate alone at night? That sounds suspicious to me. We should focus on questioning Diana more closely."
